tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_usage DECIMAL,
    tariff_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyComparison ( 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    device_id INT, 
    energy_consumed FLOAT, 
    tariff_id INT, 
    rate FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (   id INT PRIMARY KEY,   device_id INT,   timestamp TIMESTAMP,   energy_consumed DECIMAL(10, 2),   CONSTRAINT fk_device_id FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(id) )
CREATE TABLE tariff_rates (   id INT PRIMARY KEY,   tariff_name VARCHAR(50),   rate DECIMAL(10, 2) )
CREATE TABLE cost_savings (   id INT PRIMARY KEY,   analysis_id INT,   saving DECIMAL(10, 2),   CONSTRAINT fk_analysis_id FOREIGN KEY (analysis_id) REFERENCES analysis(id) )
CREATE TABLE devices (   id INT PRIMARY KEY,   device_name VARCHAR(50) )
CREATE TABLE analysis (   id INT PRIMARY KEY,   analysis_date DATE,   total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) )
